data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mendis Wickramasinghe, L. J., Vidanapathirana, Dulan Ranga, Airyarathne, Sameera, Rajeev, Gehan, Chanaka, Amila, Pastorini, Jennifer, Chathuranga, Gayan, Wickramasinghe, Nethu (2013): Lost and found: One of the world's most elusive amphibians, Pseudophilautus stellatus (Kelaart 1853) rediscovered. Zootaxa 3620 (1): 112-128, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3620.1.5
